sub_products.productName: Ellementry Sienna Terracotta Baking Dish (1500 ml) | Pan Tray for Baking | Cake Baking and Decoration Tools | Microwave Oven Safe | Dish Tray | Serving Tray & Platter| Cup Cake Server
description: Handcrafted: Our sienna terracotta baking dish is a masterpiece of art and skill, made by experienced artisans using traditional techniques and natural clay. The clay is shaped, dried in the sun, and fired in a kiln to create a durable and beautiful dish. No two dishes are exactly alike, giving them a unique charm and character that reflects the personality and style of the maker and the user.

Sustainable: Terracotta is an eco-friendly material that is biodegradable and does not contain any harmful chemicals or toxins. It is sourced from local and renewable resources, minimizing the environmental impact of its production and transportation. It also retains heat well, reducing the need for excessive energy consumption during baking. By choosing a terracotta baking dish, you are supporting sustainable practices and contributing to a greener planet.

Form and Function: The sienna terracotta baking dish has a simple yet elegant design that enhances the presentation of your food. It has a smooth surface that is easy to clean and a deep base that can hold a generous amount of ingredients. The dish also has a curved rim that prevents spills and drips. The dish is not only a practical tool, but also a decorative piece that adds beauty and warmth to your kitchen or dining table.

Material: Terracotta is a type of earthenware that is fired at low temperatures to create a porous and breathable texture. It absorbs moisture from the food, resulting in a crispy crust and a moist interior. It also enhances the flavor and aroma of the food, as it releases minerals and nutrients during cooking. Terracotta is ideal for baking dishes that require slow and even cooking, such as pies, breads, and cakes.

Food Safe: The sienna terracotta baking dish is glazed with a non-toxic and lead-free coating that makes it safe for food contact. It also prevents staining and odors from sticking to the dish, making it easy to clean and maintain. The coating also adds a glossy finish to the dish, making it more attractive and appealing. The coating is resistant to scratches and chips, ensuring that the dish remains in good condition for a long time.

Fusion: The terracotta baking dish can be used for baking various cuisines and dishes, from traditional traditonal dishes like biryanis and kormas, to international dishes like lasagnas and quiches. It can also be used for serving hot or cold dishes, as it can withstand temperature changes without cracking or breaking. The dish is a fusion of cultures and flavors, allowing you to explore your culinary creativity and diversity.

Versatile: The terracotta baking dish is suitable for oven, microwave, and dishwasher use. It can also be used on gas or electric stovetops with a heat diffuser. It can handle high temperatures as well as low temperatures. It can also be soaked in water before use to prevent sticking and burning. This terracotta baking dish is versatile and convenient, saving you time and space in the kitchen.

description: An ideal roaster for a household with up to 4 people. The volume of 3.2 quarts (3 liters) allows you to prepare great roasts, casseroles and stews. It is also perfect for baking bread.

Crafted from all-natural clay material, Römertopf clay roasters are made without Lead, Cadmium, or fillers. They have undergone safety testing in both Europe and the USA to ensure compliance.

description: Handcrafted: Our sienna terracotta baking dish is a masterpiece of art and skill, made by experienced artisans using traditional techniques and natural clay. The clay is shaped, dried in the sun, and fired in a kiln to create a durable and beautiful dish. No two dishes are exactly alike, giving them a unique charm and character that reflects the personality and style of the maker and the user.

Sustainable: Terracotta is an eco-friendly material that is biodegradable and does not contain any harmful chemicals or toxins. It is sourced from local and renewable resources, minimizing the environmental impact of its production and transportation. It also retains heat well, reducing the need for excessive energy consumption during baking. By choosing a terracotta baking dish, you are supporting sustainable practices and contributing to a greener planet.

Form and Function: The sienna terracotta baking dish has a simple yet elegant design that enhances the presentation of your food. It has a smooth surface that is easy to clean and a deep base that can hold a generous amount of ingredients. The dish also has a curved rim that prevents spills and drips. The dish is not only a practical tool, but also a decorative piece that adds beauty and warmth to your kitchen or dining table.

Material: Terracotta is a type of earthenware that is fired at low temperatures to create a porous and breathable texture. It absorbs moisture from the food, resulting in a crispy crust and a moist interior. It also enhances the flavor and aroma of the food, as it releases minerals and nutrients during cooking. Terracotta is ideal for baking dishes that require slow and even cooking, such as pies, breads, and cakes.

Food Safe: The sienna terracotta baking dish is glazed with a non-toxic and lead-free coating that makes it safe for food contact. It also prevents staining and odors from sticking to the dish, making it easy to clean and maintain. The coating also adds a glossy finish to the dish, making it more attractive and appealing. The coating is resistant to scratches and chips, ensuring that the dish remains in good condition for a long time.

Fusion: The terracotta baking dish can be used for baking various cuisines and dishes, from traditional traditonal dishes like biryanis and kormas, to international dishes like lasagnas and quiches. It can also be used for serving hot or cold dishes, as it can withstand temperature changes without cracking or breaking. The dish is a fusion of cultures and flavors, allowing you to explore your culinary creativity and diversity.

Versatile: The terracotta baking dish is suitable for oven, microwave, and dishwasher use. It can also be used on gas or electric stovetops with a heat diffuser. It can handle high temperatures as well as low temperatures. It can also be soaked in water before use to prevent sticking and burning. This terracotta baking dish is versatile and convenient, saving you time and space in the kitchen.

description: Handcrafted: Our sienna terracotta baking dish is a masterpiece of art and skill, made by experienced artisans using traditional techniques and natural clay. The clay is shaped, dried in the sun, and fired in a kiln to create a durable and beautiful dish. No two dishes are exactly alike, giving them a unique charm and character that reflects the personality and style of the maker and the user.

Sustainable: Terracotta is an eco-friendly material that is biodegradable and does not contain any harmful chemicals or toxins. It is sourced from local and renewable resources, minimizing the environmental impact of its production and transportation. It also retains heat well, reducing the need for excessive energy consumption during baking. By choosing a terracotta baking dish, you are supporting sustainable practices and contributing to a greener planet.

Form and Function: The sienna terracotta baking dish has a simple yet elegant design that enhances the presentation of your food. It has a smooth surface that is easy to clean and a deep base that can hold a generous amount of ingredients. The dish also has a curved rim that prevents spills and drips. The dish is not only a practical tool, but also a decorative piece that adds beauty and warmth to your kitchen or dining table.

Material: Terracotta is a type of earthenware that is fired at low temperatures to create a porous and breathable texture. It absorbs moisture from the food, resulting in a crispy crust and a moist interior. It also enhances the flavor and aroma of the food, as it releases minerals and nutrients during cooking. Terracotta is ideal for baking dishes that require slow and even cooking, such as pies, breads, and cakes.

Food Safe: The sienna terracotta baking dish is glazed with a non-toxic and lead-free coating that makes it safe for food contact. It also prevents staining and odors from sticking to the dish, making it easy to clean and maintain. The coating also adds a glossy finish to the dish, making it more attractive and appealing. The coating is resistant to scratches and chips, ensuring that the dish remains in good condition for a long time.

Fusion: The terracotta baking dish can be used for baking various cuisines and dishes, from traditional traditonal dishes like biryanis and kormas, to international dishes like lasagnas and quiches. It can also be used for serving hot or cold dishes, as it can withstand temperature changes without cracking or breaking. The dish is a fusion of cultures and flavors, allowing you to explore your culinary creativity and diversity.

Versatile: The terracotta baking dish is suitable for oven, microwave, and dishwasher use. It can also be used on gas or electric stovetops with a heat diffuser. It can handle high temperatures as well as low temperatures. It can also be soaked in water before use to prevent sticking and burning. This terracotta baking dish is versatile and convenient, saving you time and space in the kitchen.

description: Handcrafted: Our sienna terracotta baking dish is a masterpiece of art and skill, made by experienced artisans using traditional techniques and natural clay. The clay is shaped, dried in the sun, and fired in a kiln to create a durable and beautiful dish. No two dishes are exactly alike, giving them a unique charm and character that reflects the personality and style of the maker and the user.

Sustainable: Terracotta is an eco-friendly material that is biodegradable and does not contain any harmful chemicals or toxins. It is sourced from local and renewable resources, minimizing the environmental impact of its production and transportation. It also retains heat well, reducing the need for excessive energy consumption during baking. By choosing a terracotta baking dish, you are supporting sustainable practices and contributing to a greener planet.

Form and Function: The sienna terracotta baking dish has a simple yet elegant design that enhances the presentation of your food. It has a smooth surface that is easy to clean and a deep base that can hold a generous amount of ingredients. The dish also has a curved rim that prevents spills and drips. The dish is not only a practical tool, but also a decorative piece that adds beauty and warmth to your kitchen or dining table.

Material: Terracotta is a type of earthenware that is fired at low temperatures to create a porous and breathable texture. It absorbs moisture from the food, resulting in a crispy crust and a moist interior. It also enhances the flavor and aroma of the food, as it releases minerals and nutrients during cooking. Terracotta is ideal for baking dishes that require slow and even cooking, such as pies, breads, and cakes.

Food Safe: The sienna terracotta baking dish is glazed with a non-toxic and lead-free coating that makes it safe for food contact. It also prevents staining and odors from sticking to the dish, making it easy to clean and maintain. The coating also adds a glossy finish to the dish, making it more attractive and appealing. The coating is resistant to scratches and chips, ensuring that the dish remains in good condition for a long time.

Fusion: The terracotta baking dish can be used for baking various cuisines and dishes, from traditional traditonal dishes like biryanis and kormas, to international dishes like lasagnas and quiches. It can also be used for serving hot or cold dishes, as it can withstand temperature changes without cracking or breaking. The dish is a fusion of cultures and flavors, allowing you to explore your culinary creativity and diversity.

Versatile: The terracotta baking dish is suitable for oven, microwave, and dishwasher use. It can also be used on gas or electric stovetops with a heat diffuser. It can handle high temperatures as well as low temperatures. It can also be soaked in water before use to prevent sticking and burning. This terracotta baking dish is versatile and convenient, saving you time and space in the kitchen.

description: An ideal roaster for a household with up to 4 people. The volume of 3.2 quarts (3 liters) allows you to prepare great roasts, casseroles and stews. It is also perfect for baking bread.

description: High-Quality Material: Crafted from premium terracotta clay, this pot is known for its strength and durability. It is designed to withstand outdoor conditions, including sun, rain, and frost, without losing its integrity.

Excellent Drainage: The porous nature of terracotta allows for optimal drainage, preventing overwatering and waterlogged soil. This feature promotes healthy root growth and helps prevent root rot, ensuring the well-being of your plants.

Breathability: Terracotta clay allows air to circulate through the pot, promoting aeration of the soil and preventing the buildup of harmful fungi and bacteria. This encourages root development and ensures a healthy growing environment.

Handmade and Unique: Each Terracotta Clay Pot is meticulously handmade, giving it a distinct character and charm. The slight variations in color, texture, and shape make each pot unique and add to its overall appeal.

Multi-Purpose Use: Beyond gardening, terracotta clay pots can serve multiple purposes. They can be used for storage, organization, or even as decorative pieces, adding a touch of warmth and elegance to any room.
